welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kidapawan, the city of majestic mountains and lush landscapes. Known as the "Fruit Basket of the Philippines," we invite you to explore our vibrant markets, stunning natural beauty, and rich cultural heritage. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in all that Kidapawan has to offer!
